title: Statement of need
text: Following announced (2016) deprecation twitteR package [@twitteR], R users seeking interact Twitter APIs encouraged use rtweet package. Use --date actively-maintained rtweet package especially important light changes Twitter’s APIs since 2016. notably increased character limit (140 280) Twitter statuses [@tweetmodeextended]. addition providing updated interface similar functionality twitteR, allowing R users communicate various endpoints Twitter’s REST API, rtweet package also provides support communicating Twitter’s stream API.

title: Statement of need
text: Interest Twitter data continues grow, many task actually collecting analyzing data via Twitter APIs remains daunting. example, order interact Twitter’s APIs users must, addition identifying digesting relevant information Twitter’s developer documentation, build/send/receive requests, manage rate limits, wrangle nested real-time response objects analysis-friendly data structures. Fortunately, rtweet R package [@rtweet] designed simplify processes, making interacting Twitter’s APIs accessible wider range users. main goals rtweet package two-fold. first goal make interacting Twitter’s APIs approachable streamlined less computationally-experienced users. second goal assist analysis Twitter data via converting information returned Twitter’s APIs tabular data structures providing several convenience functions common analytical techniques examining Twitter networks frequency tweets time. short, although certainly possible users write Twitter API wrapper functions, heavy-lifting done rtweet () streamline building, authorizing, sending API requests, (b) wrangle deeply nested JSON data tabular structures, (c) provide convenience functions relevant popular analytical techniques, make valuable contribution area collecting analyzing Twitter data. Although rtweet provides coverage user context-behaviors (e.g., posting statuses, liking tweets, following users, etc.), primary audience package date researchers. Accordingly, rtweet featured numerous popular press [e.g., @bajak2019democrats; @machlis2019r; @riley2019twitter] academic publications [e.g., @bossetta2018simulated; @bradley2019major; @buscema2018media; @erlandsen2018twitter; @gitto2019brand; @kearney2019analyzing; @kearney2018analyzing; @li2019sentiment; @lutkenhaus2019tailoring; @lutkenhaus2019mapping; @molyneux2018media; @tsoi2018can; @unsihuay2018topic; @valls2017urban; @wu2018finding].

code: TWIT_paginate_max_id(   token,   api,   params,   get_id = function(x) x$id_str,   n = 1000,   page_size = 200,   since_id = NULL,   max_id = NULL,   count_param = "count",   retryonratelimit = NULL,   verbose = TRUE )  TWIT_paginate_cursor(   token,   api,   params,   n = 5000,   page_size = 5000,   cursor = "-1",   get_id = function(x) x$ids,   retryonratelimit = NULL,   verbose = TRUE )  TWIT_paginate_chunked(   token,   api,   params_list,   retryonratelimit = NULL,   verbose = TRUE )  TWIT_paginate_premium(   token,   api,   params,   n = 100,   page_size = 100,   cursor = "next",   retryonratelimit = NULL,   verbose = TRUE )

title: Pagination — TWIT_paginate_max_id
text: token Use override authentication single API call. many cases better changing default calls. See auth_as() details. get_id single argument function returns vector ids given JSON response. defaults chosen cover common cases, need double check whenever implementing pagination new endpoint. n Desired number results return. Results downloaded pages n large; default value download single page. Set n = Inf download many results possible. Twitter API rate limits number requests can perform 15 minute period. easiest way download use retryonratelimit = TRUE. guaranteed get exactly n results back. get fewer results tweets deleted hit rate limit. get results ask number tweets multiple page size, e.g. request n = 150 page size 200, get 200 results back. since_id Supply vector ids data frame previous results find tweets newer since_id. max_id Supply vector ids data frame previous results find tweets older max_id. retryonratelimit TRUE, rate limit exhausted, wait refreshes. Twitter rate limits refresh every 15 minutes. FALSE, rate limit exceeded, function terminate early warning; still get back results received point. default value, NULL, consults option rtweet.retryonratelimit can globally set TRUE, desired. expect query take hours days perform, rely solely retryonratelimit handle common failure modes like temporarily losing internet connection. verbose Show progress bars messages indicating current progress? cursor page results return. default return first page; can supply result previous call continue pagination left .

what: Mark a user id as a screen name — as_screenname
title: Mark a user id as a screen name — as_screenname
text: two ways identify Twitter user: screen name (e.g. "justinbieber") user identifier (e.g. "27260086"). User identifiers look like regular numbers, actually 64-bit integers stored R's numeric vectors. reason, rtweet always returns ids strings. Unfortunately introduces ambiguity, user names can also consist solely numbers (e.g. "123456") obvious whether string consisting numbers screen name user id. default, rtweet assume user id, screen name consists numbers, need use as_screenname() tell rtweet actually screen name. Note general, best using user ids; screen names static may change longer periods time.

FALSE, rate limit exceeded, function terminate early warning; still get back results received point. default value, NULL, consults option rtweet.retryonratelimit can globally set TRUE, desired. expect query take hours days perform, rely solely retryonratelimit handle common failure modes like temporarily losing internet connection. verbose Show progress bars messages indicating current progress? token Use override authentication single API call. many cases better changing default calls. text: address Desired location typically form place name, subregion, e.g., address = "lawrence, KS". Also accepts name countries, e.g., address = "usa", address = "brazil" states, e.g., address = "missouri" cities, e.g., address = "chicago". cases using address sufficient. components Unit analysis address e.g., components = "country:US". title: Get coordinates of specified location. — lookup_coords
text: Since Google Maps implemented stricter API requirements, sending requests Google's API convenient. enable basic uses without requiring Google Maps API key, number major cities throughout word following two larger locations baked function: 'world' 'usa'. 'world' supplied bounding box maximum latitutde/longitude values, .e., c(-180, -90, 180, 90), center point c(0, 0) returned. 'usa' supplied estimates United States' bounding box mid-point returned. specify city, provide city name followed space US state abbreviation country name. see list included cities, enter rtweet:::citycoords R console see coordinates data.

title: Posts status update to user's Twitter account — post_tweet
text: status Character, tweet status. Must 280 characters less. media Length 1 character vector file path video media -length 4 character vector file paths static images included tweet. caller responsible managing . token Use override authentication single API call. many cases better changing default calls. See auth_as() details. in_reply_to_status_id Status ID tweet like reply. Note: line Twitter API, parameter ignored unless author tweet parameter references mentioned within status text. destroy_id delete status, supply single status ID . character string supplied, overriding default (NULL), destroy request made (status text media attachments) irrelevant. retweet_id retweet status, supply single status ID . character string supplied, overriding default (NULL), retweet request made (status text media attachments) irrelevant. auto_populate_reply_metadata set TRUE used in_reply_to_status_id, leading @mentions looked original Tweet, added new Tweet . Defaults FALSE. media_alt_text attach additional alt text metadata media uploading. length media (.e. many alt text entries media entries). See official API documentation information. lat numeric value representing latitude location tweet refers . Range -90 90 (north). Note enable "Precise location" option account via Settings privacy > Privacy Safety > Location. See official Help Center section. long numeric value representing longitude location tweet refers . Range -180 180 (west). See lat parameter. display_coordinates Put pin exact coordinates tweet sent . Value TRUE FALSE. parameter apply provided valid lat/long pair valid values.

title: Get tweets data on statuses identified via search query. — search_tweets
text: q Query searched, used filter select tweets return Twitter's REST API. Must character string exceed maximum 500 characters. Spaces behave like boolean "" operator. search tweets containing least one multiple possible terms, separate search term spaces "" (caps). example, search q = "data science" looks tweets containing "data" "science" located anywhere tweets order. "" entered search terms, query = "data science", Twitter's REST API return tweet contains either "data" "science." also possible search exact phrases using double quotes. , either wrap single quotes around search query using double quotes, e.g., q = '"data science"' escape internal double quote single backslash, e.g., q = "\"data science\"". useful query tips: Exclude retweets via "-filter:retweets" Exclude quotes via "-filter:quote" Exclude replies via "-filter:replies" Filter (return ) verified via "filter:verified" Exclude verified via "-filter:verified" Get everything (firehose free) via "-filter:verified filter:verified" Filter (return ) tweets links news articles via "filter:news" Filter (return ) tweets media "filter:media" n Desired number results return. Results downloaded pages n large; default value download single page. Set n = Inf download many results possible. Twitter API rate limits number requests can perform 15 minute period. easiest way download use retryonratelimit = TRUE. guaranteed get exactly n results back. get fewer results tweets deleted hit rate limit. get results ask number tweets multiple page size, e.g. request n = 150 page size 200, get 200 results back. type Character string specifying type search results return Twitter's REST API. current default type = "recent", valid types include type = "mixed" type = "popular". include_rts Logical, indicating whether include retweets search results. Retweets classified tweet generated Twitter's built-"retweet" (recycle arrows) function. distinct quotes (retweets additional text provided sender) manual retweets (old school method manually entering "RT" text one's tweets). geocode Geographical limiter template "latitude,longitude,radius" e.g., geocode = "37.78,-122.40,1mi". since_id Supply vector ids data frame previous results find tweets newer since_id. max_id Supply vector ids data frame previous results find tweets older max_id. parse TRUE, default, returns tidy data frame. Use FALSE return "raw" list corresponding JSON returned Twitter API. token Use override authentication single API call. many cases better changing default calls. See auth_as() details. retryonratelimit TRUE, rate limit exhausted, wait refreshes. Twitter rate limits refresh every 15 minutes. FALSE, rate limit exceeded, function terminate early warning; still get back results received point. default value, NULL, consults option rtweet.retryonratelimit can globally set TRUE, desired. expect query take hours days perform, rely solely retryonratelimit handle common failure modes like temporarily losing internet connection. verbose Show progress bars messages indicating current progress? ... arguments passed query parameters request sent Twitter's REST API. return English language tweets, example, use lang = "en". options see Twitter's API documentation.

Use four latitude/longitude bounding box points stream geo location. must provided via vector length 4, e.g., c(-125, 26, -65, 49). timeout Integer specifying number seconds stream tweets . Stream indefinitely timeout = Inf. stream can interrupted time, file_name still valid file. parse Use FALSE opt-parsing tweets. token Use override authentication single API call. many cases better changing default calls. title: Save Twitter data as a comma separated value file. — write_as_csv
text: x Data frame returned rtweet function. file_name Desired name save file . file_name include extension ".csv" added automatically. prepend_ids Logical indicating whether prepend "x" Twitter IDs (users, statuses, lists, etc.). recommended saving CSV values otherwise get treated numeric result values often less precise due rounding class-related quirks. Defaults true. na Value used missing (NA)s. Defaults empty character, "". fileEncoding Encoding used saving CSV. defaults "UTF-8".

title: rtweet 2.0.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-02-24 major release signal end API v1.1 functions. Fix problem auth_sitrep() correctly handling old tokens. Since httr2 > 0.2.3, rtweet refreshes OAuth 2.0 tokens automatically. longer needed user rtweet_oauth2(), authentication fully handled httr2. Document deprecated functions API v1.1 API v2: see help("rtweet-deprecated", "rtweet"). New function client_clean() remove client’s data (together auth_clean() leave user cache empty).

title: rtweet 1.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2023-10-16 Fix auth_sitrep() work well OAuth2 tokens. Added new function tweet_quoted() search tweets quoting tweet. New tweet_post() tweet_delete() post delete tweets work free product. Fix problems changes .atomic(NULL).

title: rtweet 1.2.0
text: New client_* functions save, set use client app using Twitter API via new authentication mechanism rtweet_oauth2() (see ). helper function scopes client allowed set_scopes(). Endpoint different scope requirements. New authentication mechanism rtweet_oauth2() required endpoints. valid 2 hours automatically renewed, left user save every time renewed.

title: rtweet 1.2.0
text: New endpoints retrieve data twitter, action performed (blocking, muting, posting new tweets…): New list endpoints: list_expansions(), list_fields(), list_followers(), list_get(), list_members(), list_membership(), list_tweets(). New tweet endpoints: tweet_get(), tweet_liking_users(), tweet_retweeted_by(). New user endpoints: user_blocked(),user_bookmarks(),user_by_username(), user_following(), user_followers(), user_liked_tweets(), user_list_follows(), user_lists(), user_mentions(), user_search(), user_self(), user_timeline(), user_tweets(). New statistic endpoints: tweet_counts_recent(), tweet_counts_all().

title: rtweet 1.2.0
text: Small breaking change: expansions fields arguments now use NA NULL none. New functions set expansions fields new functions: set_expansions(), set_fields(). Fixed bug prevented auth_setup_default() work (#756 #744) Fixed bug streaming functions use current token.

title: rtweet 1.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-01-09 Fixed bug prevented posting multiple media tweet. Argument premium correctly handled search_fullarchive search_30day (#720). ts_plot uses first two columns grouped data.frames plotting (#724 #727). get_timeline returns user data multiple accounts (#723). network_data now handles deleted accounts (#730). retryonratelimit works paginated endpoints (#732). Fixed multiple bugs prevented auth_sitrep() work cases. Provided rbind subsetting methods ([) rtweet new classes. Fixed bug sending private message (#735). Provided function clean_tweets() cleaning entities text tweets (#721). New helper methods extracting data entities tweets: entity(). Columns parsed output now always order (#740). New methods retrieve ids() multiple classes print nicer post_tweet() (#452). post_tweet() now invisible returns tweet information. Provides initial support API v2 streaming endpoints: filtered_stream() sample_stream(), including adding rules stream_add_rules() stream_rm_rules(). Deprecated old stream function. Handle graciously whole data.frame used lookup_tweets().

title: rtweet 1.0.0
text: Data returned rtweet nested uses names provided Twitter API. doesn’t compute add new columns previously. emojis, langs stopwordslangs data longer provided rtweet. get_friends() get_followers() return similar formatted output two columns “from_id” “to_id” (#308, @alexpghayes). paginated functions don’t return tweets now use consistent pagination interface. store “next cursor” rtweet_cursor attribute, automatically retrieved use cursor argument. Functions return tweets (e.g. get_favorites(), get_my_timeline(), get_timeline(), get_mentions(), lists_statuses() search_tweets()) now expose consistent pagination interface. support max_id since_id find earlier later tweets respectively, well retryonratelimit wait long needed rate limited (#510). suggested_slugs(), suggested_users(), suggested_users_all() removed stopped working Twitter remove suggested users endpoint June 2019 (https://twittercommunity.com/t/124732). parse = FALSE always means return raw “JSON”. Previously functions (e.g. my_friendships()) return raw HTTP response instead (#504). rtweet longer re-exports magrittr pipe %>%; want continue using , ’ll need library(magrittr) library(dplyr) (#522).

title: rtweet 1.0.0
text: authentication system rewritten, check following section. lookup_collections() get_collections() hard deprecated underlying Twitter API deprecated. previous_cursor() hard deprecated. used lists_memberships() dropped favour making regular pagination better. tweet_shot() hard deprecated screenshots tweet. might come back webshot2 (#458). home argument get_timeline() deprecated. can retrieve home timeline logged user, ’s job get_my_timeline() (#550). Due changes rtweet data format, functions related flattening data (write_as_csv(), save_as_csv() flatten(), unflatten(), read_twitter_csv()) deprecated. Users decide flatten nested structure data. lookup_statuses() deprecated favour lookup_tweets(). as_userid() deprecated since case ambiguity default assume numeric string user id (#520). functions now use single user_type() function behaviour identical rtweet functions. get_timelines() deprecated since thing get_timeline() (#509). stream_tweets2() deprecated favour stream_tweets().

title: rtweet 1.0.0
text: rtweet’s authentication system completely written. now based around three authentication options: rtweet_user(), rtweet_app(), rtweet_bot(). Authentication longer touches ~/.Renviron file; instead auth_save() auth_as() allow explicitly save load authentication mechanisms system config directory. See vignette("auth") details. httpuv package now suggested, since ’s needed interactive auth, ’ll prompted install needed. bearer_token() deprecated favour rtweet_app(), takes bearer token found Twitter developer portal. invalidate_bearer() deprecated since something Twitter developer portal. create_token() deprecated favour combination rtweet_user()/rtweet_bot()/rtweet_app() + auth_as() + auth_save(). get_token() get_tokens() deprecated favour auth_get() auth_list(). auth_as() accepts path authentication make easier use authentications outside user account (#602, @maelle) auth_setup_default() authenticate save use default token. new auth_sitrep() helps reports different authentications user

title: rtweet 1.0.0
text: Update new rOpenSci Code Conduct: https://ropensci.org/code--conduct/ lookup_users() search_users() now returns data frame containing information user (latest tweet). want get data can use tweets_data(). rtweet 1.0.0 implements consistent strategy handling rate limits. default, paginated function (.e. rtweet function performs multiple calls twitter API) rate-limited return results received point, along warning telling get results. Alternatively, want automatically wait rate-limit reset, can set retryratelimit = TRUE. default value retryonratelimit comes option rtweet.retryonratelimit can globally set TRUE desired (#173). functions perform multiple requests behalf now display progress bar know ’s happening. don’t want , can turn verbose = FALSE (#518). Banned protected accounts now trigger warning instead error, data users requested served API returned NA (#590, @simonheb). Added support posting alt-text metadata images tweeted status updated via post_tweet(). (#425, @hrbrmstr) stream_tweets() overhauled write valid data. obsoletes previous strategy clean bad data fact (#350, #356). maintainer changed. New user_block() user_unblock() block unblock users (#593, @simonheb). new tweet_threading function now faster reliable (#305, #693, @charliejhadley). Message now properly capitalized (#565, @jsta) Fields withheld_scope, withheld_copyright, withheld_in_countries now correctly parsed (#647, @alexpghayes). Functions like search_tweets(), lookup_statuses() others return appropriate date time format right columns (created_at mostly) (#653, #657, #660, @alexpghayes, @RickPat). Premium/sandbox environments supported search_fullarchive() search_30day() (#578, #713). vignette must pre-computed submission (#609, @maelle).
